li.label: terrible festive singing
li.description: The leader displayed a lack of passion and the festive feeling just wasn't there.

li.label: boring festive singing
li.description: The leader treated us like children, wanting so desperately to hear something to lift their spirits.

li.label: fun festive singing
li.description: The leader lifted our spirits and made us feel a festive spirit that will only make us stronger.

li.label: unforgettable festive singing
li.description: We can still hear the mesmerizing words of the carols, as they reminded us of the importance of our shared beliefs. We can just feel our sadness vanish away.
